tool.name: Handle influx_si data input in Galaxy workflows

param.name: in_physiofit
param.label: mflux
param.help: Output of physiofit which corresponds to the .mflux input

param.name: in_isocor
param.label: miso
param.help: Output of isocor which corresponds to the .miso input

param.name: in_linp
param.label: linp
param.help: File contianing label inputs for experiments (.linp file)

param.name: in_netw
param.label: netw
param.help: File containing network for experiments (.netw file)

param.name: in_mmet
param.label: mmet
param.help: File containing specie concentrations for experiments (.mmet file)

param.name: in_cnstr
param.label: cnstr
param.help: File containing constraints onf fluxes and specie concentrations for experiments (.constr file)

param.name: in_tvar
param.label: tvar
param.help: File containing types of variables for experiments (.tvar file)

param.name: in_opt
param.label: opt
param.help: File containing options for influx_si (.opt file)

param.name: verbose
param.label: Debug mode
param.help: Select "Yes" to have debug logs be printed out
